TopicTitle: Incom Technologies is happy to participate in the community.

Articles.Content:
Hello. I am the representative of Incom Technologies.

Well, I would be, but for now I'm just yet another person playing KSP. Maybe in a few years.

I have been active on the Steam forum for a little while now, under the username VestedGamr, and have finally decided to join the main forum.

Welcome to the Forums.

Hope you enjoy.

Mota Space Agency here!
